The DBInstance with DBInstanceIdentifier 'doc-1-db-1' has VpcSecurityGroups with Status 'active'
The DBInstance with DBInstanceIdentifier 'doc-1-db-1' has DBSubnetGroup with DBSubnetGroupName 'doc-1-subnet'
The DBSubnetGroup with DBSubnetGroupName 'doc-1-subnet' has DBSubnetGroupDescription 'Neptune DB subnet group'
The DBSubnetGroup with DBSubnetGroupName 'doc-1-subnet' has VpcId 'vpc-0ce6486d890849dc3'
The DBSubnetGroup with DBSubnetGroupName 'doc-1-subnet' has SubnetGroupStatus 'Complete'
The DBSubnetGroup with DBSubnetGroupName 'doc-1-subnet' has Subnet with SubnetIdentifier 'subnet-09b7b1f27834423b2'
The Subnet with SubnetIdentifier 'subnet-09b7b1f27834423b2' has SubnetAvailabilityZone with Name 'us-east-1a'
The Subnet with SubnetIdentifier 'subnet-09b7b1f27834423b2' has SubnetStatus 'Active'
